mainSequence.step: Web Interface queries overdue books from the Database
Database returns the list of overdue books to the Web Interface
Web Interface displays the list of overdue books to the Librarian
Web Interface triggers the process of sending overdue notices via Notification System
Notification System looks up borrower contact information from the Database
Database returns the borrower contact information to the Notification System
Notification System confirms that notifications have been sent to the Librarian
